title: If I see over 50 general tarot readings and they told the same messages in each reading, does this mean that the messages are for me? - Quora

response.answer_text: General readings are “generic” and mostly play with human psychology. Firstly its not advisable to consult or check with 50 tarot readers. Please understand tarots are energy based, and you pick on the same vibrations. The instored subconscious mind gets manipulated and you start manifesting what might not be true to your situation often leading to false hopes, and heartbreak and what looks like you are connecting to the reader might actually mislead you. Rather than going to 50, kindly consult 1 and take a personal reading as deemed fit.

If you hear same message many times that is for you. Our sprit team/angels try to communicate same messages again and again if we doubt it is real or not. Repetition of same message/s is a clear sign they are talking the right/relevant message for you.
